name: King's Valet
description:
Character deals +1 DMG.
When played: During this Round, the next time you play a Talent card or a Character uses an Elemental Skill, spend 2 fewer Elemental Dice.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)
